name: UNKNOWN REGION
description:
You are one of the chosen survivors to set up your life in UNKNOWN REGION. Life has forever changed after an unknown virus has wiped out humanity. Navigate through the region to discover mutated humans and creatures.
You will be challenged to test your survival skills. Throughout the region you will craft, build, fight, and scavenge for supplies and battle the elements every step of the way. you will need to be one hell of a fighter to survive this.

Key Features:


1. Single-player
2. Multiplayer
3. Online co-op
4. Survival
5. Crafting
6. Base building
7. Resource harvesting
8. Hunting
9. Looting
10. Daynight cycle and dynamic weather and season
11. Companion AI[DOG]
12. Save load single-player and multiplayer
13. Save wipeout single-player and multiplayer
14. 1st Person and 3rd Person Survival horror Simulator
15. Food cooking and base upgrading system
16. Gun repair and upgrading system
17. Vehicles(Steampunk cars, scooters, jeeps)
18. Farming system
19. Base Raiding System
20.Open World Survival
